thread.title: Nielsen says 15.8 million watched Democratic debate
thread.title_full: Nielsen says 15.8 million watched Democratic debate - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David Bauder, Ap Television Writer
title: Nielsen says 15.8 million watched Democratic debate
text: Photo: John Locher, AP Hillary Rodham Clinton, right, speaks as Sen. Bernie Sanders, of Vermont, looks on during the CNN Democratic presidential debate Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas. Hillary Rodham Clinton, right, speaks as Sen. Bernie Sanders, of... NEW YORK (AP) — They aren't quite Trump numbers, but the 15.8 million people who watched the Democratic presidential debate on CNN was still the biggest TV audience ever for a Democratic debate. Hillary Rodham Clinton, right, speaks as Sen. Bernie Sanders, of Vermont, looks on during the CNN Democratic presidential debate Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas. Hillary Rodham Clinton, right, speaks as Sen. Bernie Sanders, of... NEW YORK (AP) — They aren't quite Trump numbers, but the 15.8 million people who watched the Democratic presidential debate on CNN was still the biggest TV audience ever for a Democratic debate.
